an10.221:4.1: “Someone with ten qualities is cast down to hell.
an10.221:4.3: They kill living creatures, steal, and commit sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, and meaningless. And they’re covetous, malicious, and have wrong view.
an10.221:4.4: Someone with these ten qualities is cast down to hell.
an10.221:5.1: Someone with ten qualities is raised up to heaven.
an10.221:5.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, or meaningless. They’re contented, kind-hearted, and have right view.
an10.221:5.4: Someone with these ten qualities is raised up to heaven.”
